text: Felipe Codallos (1790 – 1849) was the 3rd Captain General of Central America and 4th Political Chief of San Salvador under the Emperor of Mexico Agustín de Iturbide On 1 July 1823, El Salvador, along with the rest of Central America, declared independence from the Mexican Empire he died in 1849 at Mexico City, Mexico Category:1790 births Category:1849 deaths Category:Central American people
title: Felipe Codallos
